description:
Today there are more and more people with a blog or personal website and this is done with web hosting. But, what is web hosting and how dose it work?

In this course I will teach you what web hosting is and most importantly HOW TO USE IT. Either if your looking to put your business website on the web, your blog or just starting with your first online business or startup this course is perfect for you.

In no time, less than 1 hour you will feel comfortable enough to be able to choose the perfect domain name and hosting to fit your needs. Get your site live! All with no technical skills required.
title: Web Hosting Fundamentals
